reading_title:
Get into a comfortable
 position and be ready
 for reading.
progress_title: You have not had any wonderful morning.
exercise_1_text:
Start with stretching. 

1. Stand straight with your feet open wider than shoulder width.

2. Standing, clasp your hands straight up overhead, palms facing the ceiling.

3. Slowly stretch up feeling a stretch in your body.

4. Keep your head and back straight, don’t bend.

5. Hold for 10 to 15 seconds, repeating three to four times.
exercise_2_text:
1. Human feet have plenty of sensitive points, which are responsible for the work of organs. 

2. Stand with feet shoulder length apart, and keep spine straight with hips facing forward. Bring your knee up so that your thigh is parallel to floor then place it down and bring the other leg up in an alternating fashion.

3. Repeat up to fifty seconds.
exercise_3_text:
1. Stand up straight.

2. Place your feet in 15 inches from each other.

3. Inhale and roll the heels to toes, exhale and gently unroll back to the heels

4. Repeat it from 20 to 25 times.
exercise_4_text:
1. The best way to warm up is rotational exercises.

2. Begin with your head then to wrists, elbows, shoulders, feet, ankles and knees.

3. Repeat it on every part of your body at least 10 tries to each side.
exercise_5_text:
Simple, but effective exercise helps to improve many important muscles. 

1. Stand straight with your feet open wider than shoulder width,  hold hands on the waist.

2. Gently bend down keeping your back flat and do one squat.

3. Pay attention to your posture to prevent injuries of knees.

4. Do 10-20 tries.
exercise_6_text:
1. Stand with your feet a little wider than hip distance apart.

2. Raise your right hand.

3. Lower your right arm down the right side of your body and exhale as you lengthen the left arm over the head, bending body gently to the right.

4. Inhale to return arms overhead to center and exhale as you repeat on the left side.

5. Repeat it at least 15 times to each side
exercise_7_text:
1. Lay with the back on the floor.

2. Your feet should be on the floor and your hands are behind your head.

3. With your hands gently holding your head, pull your shoulder blades back and slowly raise your knees to about a 90-degree angle, lifting your feet from the floor.

4. Rotate your torso so you can touch your elbow to the opposite knee as it comes up.

5. Aim for 15 repetitions for each leg.
exercise_8_text:
This exercise improves flexion
 and extension of the spine. 

1. Put your hands and knees on the ground.

2. In one fluid movement, arch your back, suck in your stomach, and bring your hips forward.

3. Now look up rather than into your legs or at the floor.

4. Repeat it at least 15 times to each side
exercise_9_text:
1. There are toe press ups and knee press ups. The second is considred easier.

2. Keeping your body in a straight line and your elbows close to your body, bend and straighten your arms to complete a press-up.

3. If the first option is difficult, bend your knee and do the same as in the first exercise.

4. Do 15 press-ups
exercise_10_text:
1. Extend your arms with your palms facing up toward the ceiling.

2. Exhale as you extend your arms toward the ceiling.

3. Inhale as you stand on the heel and relax.

4. Repeat up to 5 times, each time extend your hands for 10 seconds.

pull_program:
To set up your program pull
 down exercises from above
appreciate: We appreciate your coziness and comfort, and therefore made the application paid. So that you can not be distracted by advertising.
subscribe_futures: Subscription will provide the opportunity to perform exercises such as: Fitness, Diary, Reading and Visualization. It renews automatically every month, but you can cancel it at any time.
sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the exercise?
choose_title: Drag and drop to change sequence of exercises and set time on them.
affirmation_hint:
1. Start with the words “I am.”
2. Use the present tense.
3. State it in the positive. Affirm what you want, not what you don’t want.
4. Keep it brief.
5. Include an action word ending with –ing.

You can use the following simple formula: “I am so happy and grateful that I am now …” and then fill in the blank.
faq_desc:
1. APPENDIX:

For people who want to change their lives, but don't know where to start.

«Magic Morning» will energize and help you to consciously plan your day.

2. «MAGIC MORNING»:

Consists of 6 blocks

Meditation - will help to slowly awaken the mind

Affirmations - charge the mind with positive emotions

Visualizations - allow you to accurately represent the desired success

Fitness - charge your body with energy

Reading - develop from the very morning! (especially if there is not enough time in the evening)

Diary - remember what you did and what you learned, write down the most important thoughts

3. HOW TO USE:

√ Start with «settings» there you can set:

- Time of each block

- Sequence blocks

- Default Affirmation

- The book you are reading

Settings can be changed at any time.

√ Now you can start making your great morning by clicking the «Start» button, everything will go according to the specified settings.

√ Progress will show:

- Time for each day

- Number of pages of books read

- YoursAffirmations

4. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS:

wonderfulmorningnow@gmail.com

I will gladly answer all your questions
